sentences.sContent: He visits his dad in prison every week.
sentences.sCn: 他每周都去探望狱中的父亲。

sentences.sContent: Ricky has been out of prison for three years now.
They’ll probably put him in prison for a long time.
sentences.sCn: 他们很可能会让他在监狱里待很长时间。

sentences.sContent: Helen was sent to prison for attacking a man with a knife.
sentences.sCn: 海伦因持刀袭击一名男子而被送入监狱。

sentences.sContent: The two men were arrested only a week after they were released from prison .
sentences.sCn: 那两名男子从监狱获释后仅仅一周就被捕了。

sentences.sContent: Three terrorists escaped from Brixton Prison .
sentences.sCn: 有三名恐怖分子从布里克斯顿监狱越狱了。
